header_text: You are at the department store to return a jacket. When you speak with a sales associate at the counter, they do not smile, and stare at you looking very annoyed.

elements.text: In the end, you realize that the person at the counter was very stressed out because of a previous customer, and once they started helping you, they were very...

elements.name: You are at the department store to return a jacket. When you speak with a sales associate at the counter, they do not smile, and stare at you looking very annoyed._Social Situations_entry2
